citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 A.M. on 28-
FEB-2022.
An adult female came to the door of the facility and stated that the licensee was out of town exhibiting the animals.
Contact was then made by phone with a facility representative who stated the animals were being exhibited in the
Kentucky area.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 A.M. on 28-
FEB-2022. 
 
An adult female came to the door of the facility and stated that the licensee was out of town exhibiting the animals. 
Contact was then made by phone with a facility representative who stated the animals were being exhibited in the 
Kentucky area. 
 
 
 
End Section
